which everybody seems to be ready to grant—the sum of her rights now
outweighing the fetus’s right to life?
The most familiar argument here is the following. We are told that per-
forming  the  abortion  would  be  directly  killing*the  child,  whereas  doing
nothing would not be killing the mother, but only letting her die. Moreover,
in killing the child, one would be killing an innocent person, for the child
has committe
